name: Titan-Touched Saxifrage
description:
Saxifrage is a sturdy herb that can grow in a multitude of places. While generally found in rugged locations like mountains or on cliffs, it can also be found upon the open plains or scarcely within volcanic regions.

Herbs that grow in areas rich in the influence of the Titans, such as the Waking Shores or Thaldraszus, may similarly become empowered. These types of herbs grant a boon to the herbalist who stumbles upon them, as well as some Rousing Order.

Herbalists specialized in Titan-Touched herbs will gain the following effect when gathering:

 Enlightened Potential:
Speed increased by 15%. Gatherers specialized in Titan-Touched nodes will also have their secondary stats increased by 3%.
